BasicTypes.h

00001 #ifndef VTDFRAMEWORK_VTDTYPES_H
00002 #define VTDFRAMEWORK_VTDTYPES_H
00003 
00004 #include <cstddef>
00005 
00006 namespace VTD {
00007 
00008     typedef float Float;
00009     typedef double Double;
00010 
00011     typedef char Int8;
00012     typedef short Int16;
00013     typedef int Int32;
00014     typedef Int32 Int;
00015 
00016     typedef unsigned char UInt8;
00017     typedef unsigned short UInt16;
00018     typedef unsigned int UInt32;
00019     typedef UInt32 UInt;
00020 
00021 #define VTD_INT64_AVAILABLE
00022 #ifdef VTD_OS_LINUX
00023     typedef long Int64;
00024     typedef unsigned long UInt64;
00025 #elif VTD_OS_WINDOWS && __cplusplus >= 201103L
00026     typedef long long Int64;
00027     typedef unsigned long long UInt64;
00028 #else
00029     #undef VTD_INT64_AVAILABLE
00030     typedef Int32 Int64;
00031     typedef UInt32 UInt64;
00032 #endif
00033 
00034     typedef struct {
00035         Int64 seconds;
00036         Int64 microSeconds;
00037     } TimeValue;
00038 
00039     typedef std::size_t SizeType;
00040     typedef std::ptrdiff_t PtrDiffType;
00041 }
00042 
00043 #endif //VTDFRAMEWORK_VTDTYPES_H
